title: SelectorQuery Overview
content:
# SelectorQuery Overview

2021-05-09 18:43

The class of selector query object.

## Functions

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Name** | **Description** |
| [SelectorQuery.boundingClientRect](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-boundingclientrect) | Put the location of current selected node into the query result. |
| [SelectorQuery.exec](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-exec) | Put the query result into the `Callback`. |
| [SelectorQuery.scrollOffset](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-scrolloffset) | Put the scroll of current selected node into the query result. |
| [SelectorQuery.select](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-select) | Select the first matched node. |
| [SelectorQuery.selectAll](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-selectall) | Select all the matched nodes. |
| [SelectorQuery.selectViewport](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/api_ui_selector-query_query_selectorquery-selectviewport) | The instance of select window. |
